Product Title: Garfield and Friends: Behind the Scenes
Review Date: 2015/06/11
Store: Carl Ballantine  (Actor),     Victoria Jackson  (Actor),     Tom Tataranowicz  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, Fox TV, General
Product Description: ["He's furry! He's fat! He's all that \x96 and more!", "When he's not gobbling lasagna, taking up couch space or toying with his dog pal Odie, Garfield is busy being one hip Hollywood cat in these hilarious adventures hand-picked by creator Jim Davis! From hosting his own special about how cats are from out of this world (literally!) to animating his own cat cartoon to teaching kittens how to annoy their humans, Garfield is fantastically funny in this exclusive DVD! So bring home the humor, the wit and the fun of everyone's favorite fat cat!"]
Average Rating: 4.1

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **General Interests:** Strong affinity for animated comedies and family-oriented content.
- **Media Formats:** Prefers DVDs and other formats that are engaging and visually entertaining.
- **Humor Preference:** Enjoys lighthearted, humorous narratives featuring iconic characters, particularly those with a whimsical or nostalgic touch.
- **Engagement with Content:** Appreciates behind-the-scenes insights and storytelling that delve into character backgrounds and comedic timing.
- **Rating Tendencies:** Rates content highly, indicating a positive reception of the material consumed, as demonstrated by a perfect five-star rating.
- **Core Values:** Values quality entertainment that offers both comedy and adventure, suggesting a preference for feel-good experiences. 

Overall, the user seems to gravitate towards comedic entertainment that combines nostalgia with elements of fun and creativity, particularly focusing on animated works that engage a broad audience.
